note:
Former biochemist but escaped from the lab! Now an interdisciplinary social scientist.

General/personal account. I care about politics/current affairs but it rather overtook my Birdsite account, so it's separated out here. (So please don't take offence if I follow you on only one account! It's a judgement on content type, not quality.)
